description:
go.tools/cmd/godoc: update appinit.go to use new godoc packages

Also move some common code from main.go to handlers.go, and
exclude remotesearch.go from the appengine build (it is only
relevant to the command line interface).

messages.text:
LGTM

but it could do with a better CL description.

Hello bradfitz (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.tools

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=bb1e086e3548&repo=tools ***

go.tools/cmd/godoc: update appinit.go to use new godoc packages

Also move some common code from main.go to handlers.go, and
exclude remotesearch.go from the appengine build (it is only
relevant to the command line interface).

R=bradfitz, dsymonds
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/12001049

subject: code review 12001049: go.tools/cmd/godoc: fix app engine version
